org.apache.hive.spark.client.rpc

Class RpcServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.spark.client.rpc.RpcServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RpcServer
extends Object
implements Closeable
    An RPC server. The server matches remote clients based on a secret that is generated on the server - the secret needs to be given to the client through some other mechanism for this to work.

    • Method Detail

      • registerClient

        public io.netty.util.concurrent.Future<Rpc> registerClient(String clientId,
                                                           String secret,
                                                           RpcDispatcher serverDispatcher)
        Tells the RPC server to expect a connection from a new client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - An identifier for the client. Must be unique.
        secret - The secret the client will send to the server to identify itself.
        serverDispatcher - The dispatcher to use when setting up the RPC instance.
        Returns:
        A future that can be used to wait for the client connection, which also provides the secret needed for the client to connect.

      • cancelClient

        public void cancelClient(String clientId,
                         String msg)
        Tells the RPC server to cancel the connection from an existing pending client
        Parameters:
        clientId - The identifier for the client
        msg - The error message about why the connection should be canceled

      • createSecret

        public String createSecret()
        Creates a secret for identifying a client connection.
